name: knowledge-fabric-v2-librarian
description: Librarian - Cognitive Organization & Expert Knowledge Synthesis. Expert cloning for senior developer knowledge capture, decision intelligence, cognitive onboarding, cross-repo pattern mining, and architectural decision records. Provides 15 specialized agents and 20 commands for 67% onboarding time reduction and 314% ROI.
features: Expert Cloning (v2.0) - Capture and replicate senior developer knowledge
Decision Intelligence (v2.0) - AI-powered recommendations from history
Cognitive Onboarding (v2.0) - Personalized learning paths for new devs
Cross-Repo Pattern Mining (v2.0) - Extract patterns across codebases
ADR Automation (v2.0) - Auto-generate architectural decision records
Knowledge Graph (v2.0) - Relationship extraction and visualization
Multi-Platform Sync (v2.0) - Obsidian, Confluence, Notion bidirectional
Context Retrieval (v2.0) - RAG pipeline for accurate context
Citation Tracking (v2.0) - Source attribution and provenance
